Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ResourcePosition

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ResourceQuantity
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ResourcePosition
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ResourcePosition
extends ResourceQuantity
implements java.io.Serializable
Class Resource Position represents an amount of resources of a certain type that are stored in a certain location.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • place

      private Place place

    • shelf

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourcePosition

      public ResourcePosition​(Resource resource, Place place, NumOfShelf shelf)
      Default constructor. Creates objects of the desired resource with a quantity set to 1.
      Parameters:
      resource - the type of the resource
      place - the place where the resource is stored
      shelf - the shelf of the warehouse if the resource is stored in the warehouse, null otherwise

    • ResourcePosition

      public ResourcePosition​(int quantity, Resource resource, Place place)
      Reduced constructor used to create objects with a desired amount of resources. Used in unit tests only.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the amount of resources
      resource - the type of the resources
      place - the place where the resources are stored

    • ResourcePosition

      public ResourcePosition​(int quantity, Resource resource)
      Reduced constructor used in the peepRequirements method of the DevDeck class.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the amount of resources
      resource - the type of the resources

  • Method Details

    • getPlace

      public Place getPlace()
      Returns the place where the resource is stored.
      Returns:
      the place where the resource is stored

    • getShelf

      public NumOfShelf getShelf()
      The warehouse shelf where the resource is stored.
      Returns:
      the warehouse shelf where the resource is stored
